definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Usually we write family letters or business letters, according to a certain format.
sentences.chinese: 人们通常根据某种格式来写家信或商业信函。

sentences.english: He decide to cut remaining time after he receive his family's letter.
sentences.chinese: 他接到家信后决定缩短在这里的逗留时间。

sentences.english: I received a letter from my family yesterday.
I often write home on Saturday evening.
sentences.chinese: 星期六晚上我常常写家信。

sentences.english: I have written home but once since I came here.
sentences.chinese: 我到这里之后只写过一次家信。

sentences.english: He decided to back home in advance after he received a letter from his family.
sentences.chinese: 他接到家信后决定缩短在这里的逗留时间。

sentences.english: He decides to abridge his stay here after he received a letter from home.
sentences.chinese: 他接到家信后决定缩短在这里的逗留时间。

sentences.english: Letters and Complaints Bureau if it is only transferred to the State, who come to supervise it?
sentences.chinese: 国家信访局如果只是转送，谁又来督办呢？

sentences.english: The clerk prepared the draw, sacrificing for it one of his letters from home.
sentences.chinese: 职员开始为抽签做准备，为此他牺牲了一封家信。

sentences.english: He was so busy that he even forgot to write home.
sentences.chinese: 他忙得连家信都忘了写。

sentences.english: I expect a letter from my family.
When I was reading a letter from home, suddenly I heard someone calling me from outside.
sentences.chinese: 我正在看一封家信，突然听到有人从外面叫我。

sentences.english: It was in his letter home announcing his engagement that Hung-chien had praised his wife for being submissive.
sentences.chinese: 鸿渐赞美他夫人柔顺，是在报告订婚的家信里。

definition: to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
to take a letter/to send word
to bring sth to sb (news etc)
to announce sb's demise/to predict death
